caption.center: STATE of Arizona v. Zachary Samuel EGGERS.

opinion.posture: Appealed from the Court of Appeals, Division Two; No. 2 CA-CR 05-0320.
opinion.opinion_text:
¶ 1. ORDERED: Petition for Review = DENIED.
¶ 2. FURTHER ORDERED: The State of Arizona's Cross-Petition for Review = DENIED.
¶ 3. FURTHER ORDERED: The Court of Appeals' Opinion shall not be published, pursuant to Rule 111(g), Arizona Rules of the Supreme Court.
